Key Match Events: Bailey Peacock-Farrell made a poor decision to play the ball sideways to Daniel Ballard, allowing Bulgaria captain Kiril Despodov to tap in at the back post for the only goal of the night.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place in Plovdiv, Bulgaria.
Others: Northern Ireland weathered a first-half storm in Plovdiv before gifting the decisive goal to Bulgaria in the second half, resulting in a 1-0 defeat.
